oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On Drugs in South Georgia
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brett, Jim
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Drug usage
prevention
management
nonmedical intervention
therapeutic drug use
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Drug usage is an everyday occurrence in livestock units, especially on dairies. Although we stress prevention, management, and other nonmedical intervention to farm problems or diseases, therapeutic drug use is needed. Before I get to the actual practice tip portion of my presentation, I feel I must first step on a few toes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1998; 266-268
